instructions: Begin by tapping the Settings icon. Scroll down the Settings screen and tap iTunes & App Store . In the Automatic Downloads section, move the sliders next to each category of content you want to download automatically to the On/green position. Options include: Music Apps Books & Audiobooks App Updates On the same screen, in the Cellular Data section, slide the slider next to Automatic Downloads to On/green positive if you want to allow the automatic downloads to be sent over a cellular mobile phone network, not just Wi-Fi. You may get your downloads sooner, but cellular downloads may use battery life or incur data roaming charges .
